mapper.sql: SELECT pi.inspection_state, pi.inspection_remarks, pi.inspection_number, fpa.finance_parameter_name currencyName, fpb.finance_parameter_name taxRateName, pi.purchase_requisition_date FROM jr_purchase_inspection pi LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpa ON ( pi.currency_id = fpa.id ) LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpb ON ( pi.tax_rate_id = fpb.id ) WHERE pi.inspection_number = #{inspectionNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT pis.inspection_state, pis.order_numbers, pis.material_name, pis.inspectionr_specifications, pis.inspection_company, pis.order_quantity, pis.unit_price, pis.inspection_money, pis.inspection_remarks, pi.inspection_number FROM jr_purchase_inspection pi LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_inspection_schedule pis ON ( pi.inspection_number = pis.inspection_number ) WHERE pis.inspection_number = #{oddNumbers}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_purchase_inspection_schedule ( order_numbers, material_name, inspectionr_specifications, inspection_company, order_quantity, unit_price, inspection_money, inspection_number, inspection_remarks, inspection_subclass, inspection_state, inspection_category, inspection_location, inspection_material, inspection_brand, inspection_code, inspection_deposit ) VALUES ( #{orderNumbers}, #{materialName}, #{inspectionrSpecifications}, #{inspectionCompany}, #{orderQuantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{inspectionMoney}, #{inspectionNumber}, #{inspectionRemarks}, #{inspectionSubclass}, #{inspectionState}, #{inspectionCategory}, #{inspectionLocation}, #{inspectionMaterial}, #{inspectionBrand}, #{inspectionCode}, #{inspectionDeposit} )

INSERT INTO jr_purchase_inspection ( purchase_requisition_date, inspection_number, supplier_name, inspection_type, order_quantity, inspection_preparer, inspection_preparation_date, inspection_remarks, tax_rate_id, currency_id ) VALUES ( #{purchaseRequisitionDate}, #{inspectionNumber}, #{supplierName}, #{inspectionType}, #{orderQuantity}, #{inspectionPreparer}, #{inspectionPreparationDate}, #{inspectionRemarks}, #{taxRateId}, #{currencyId} )
mapper.select: SELECT pi.id, pi.inspection_state, pi.purchase_requisition_date, pi.inspection_number, pi.supplier_name, pi.inspection_type, pi.order_quantity, pi.inspection_preparer, pi.inspection_preparation_date, pi.inspection_remarks FROM jr_purchase_inspection pi WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY pi.inspection_preparation_date ORDER BY pi.inspection_preparation_date DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE jr_purchase_inspection_schedule set inspection_state = 2 WHERE id = #{ids}
UPDATE jr_purchase_inspection_schedule set inspection_state = 1 WHERE id = #{ids}
mapper.select: SELECT pis.id, pis.order_quantity, pis.material_name, pis.inspectionr_specifications, pis.inspection_qualified, pis.inspection_describe FROM jr_purchase_inspection_schedule pis WHERE 1 = 1 AND pis.id = #{ids}
mapper.update: UPDATE jr_purchase_inspection_schedule set inspection_qualified = #{purchaseInspectionSchedule.inspectionQualified},inspection_quality = #{purchaseInspectionSchedule.userName}, inspection_quality_date = #{purchaseInspectionSchedule.inspectionQualityDate},inspection_describe = #{purchaseInspectionSchedule.inspectionDescribe}, inspection_state = 3 WHERE id = #{purchaseInspectionSchedule.id}
UPDATE jr_purchase_inspection_schedule set inspection_qualified = "",inspection_quality = "", inspection_describe = "", inspection_state = 2 WHERE id = #{ids}
mapper.select: SELECT pis.id, pis.inspection_code, pis.order_numbers, pis.material_name, pis.inspectionr_specifications, pis.inspection_material, pis.inspection_brand, pis.inspection_company, pis.inspection_qualified, pis.unit_price, pis.inspection_qualified * pis.unit_price as inspectionMoney , pis.inspection_location, pis.inspection_remarks, pi.supplier_name, pi.currency_id, pi.tax_rate_id, pis.inspection_number, pis.uuid, pis.inspection_deposit FROM jr_purchase_inspection_schedule pis LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_inspection pi ON ( pi.inspection_number = pis.inspection_number ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND pis.id = #{id}
SELECT ws.id, ws.storage_coding, ws.storage_numbers FROM jr_warehouse_storage ws WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY ws.storage_coding ORDER BY ws.storage_date DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_warehouse_storage ( storage_state, storage_date, storage_coding, storage_numbers, supplier_name, storage_library, storage_quantity, tax_rate_id, currency_id, storage_preparer, storage_preparer_date, order_number, storage_code, storage_name, storage_specifications, storage_quality, storage_brand, storage_company, unit_price, storage_money, storage_location, storage_remarks, storage_subclass, storage_category, uuid ) VALUES ( #{storageState}, #{storageDate}, #{storageCoding}, #{storageNumbers}, #{supplierName}, #{storageLibrary}, #{storageQuantity}, #{taxRateId}, #{currencyId}, #{storagePreparer}, #{storagePreparerDate}, #{orderNumber}, #{storageCode}, #{storageName}, #{storageSpecifications}, #{storageQuality}, #{storageBrand}, #{storageCompany}, #{unitPrice}, #{storageMoney}, #{storageLocation}, #{storageRemarks}, #{storageSubclass}, #{storageCategory}, #{uuid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jr_purchase_inspection_schedule set inspection_library = #{purchaseInspectionScheduleData.inspectionLibrary},inspection_library_date = #{purchaseInspectionScheduleData.inspectionLibraryDate}, inspection_library_code = #{purchaseInspectionScheduleData.inspectionLibraryCode}, uuid = #{purchaseInspectionScheduleData.uuid}, inspection_state = 4 WHERE id = #{purchaseInspectionScheduleData.id}
mapper.select: SELECT ws.id, ws.storage_coding, ws.storage_numbers FROM jr_warehouse_storage ws WHERE 1 = 1 AND ws.storage_numbers = #{inspectionNumber} GROUP BY ws.storage_numbers
mapper.update: UPDATE jr_purchase_inspection_schedule set inspection_library = "",inspection_library_code = "", uuid = "",inspection_state = 3 WHERE id = #{ids}
